body_content.explanation: able to be pressed into a smaller space:
examples: Because plastic bags are light and compressible, they constitute only 2 percent of landfill.

body_content.explanation: (of a computer file) able to be made to use less space when it is stored in the memory of a computer or on a disk, by using a special program:
examples: Files are compressible in some applications, which saves memory.
The degree to which the data is compressible depends on how many repeating patterns the data has.
